com.ratio.deviceService

Class BTLEDeviceManager.BTDeviceInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ratio.deviceService.BTLEDeviceManager.BTDeviceInfo
  • Enclosing class:
    BTLEDeviceManager

    public class BTLEDeviceManager.BTDeviceInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    there is a 1:1 relationship between a bluetooth device and a bluetooth gatt. We hold on to the connection state because there was some weird issue with actually getting it from BluetoothGatt.
